translation.cy: Myfyrwyr sy'n cychwyn ar raglen AGA ôl-radd uwchradd ym mis Medi 2019 - i'w galluogi i addysgu drwy'r Gymraeg – a darparwyr addysg gychwynnol athrawon yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Students commencing a secondary postgraduate ITE programme in September 2019 enabling them to teach through the medium of Welsh and initial teacher education (ITE) providers in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae'r cynllun cymhelliant yn cefnogi strategaeth Cymraeg 2050, cynllun hirdymor Llywodraeth Cymru i gyrraedd y targed o filiwn o siaradwyr Cymraeg erbyn 2050.
translation.en: The incentive scheme supports the Cymraeg 2050 Welsh language strategy, the Welsh Government’s long-term approach to achieving the target of a million Welsh speakers by 2050.

translation.en: The Welsh Ministers have powers under sections 14-17 of the Education Act 2002 to provide financial assistance for the promotion of the recruitment or retention of teachers or non-teaching staff.

translation.cy: 1.1	Mae'r adran hon yn cynnig trosolwg byr o Gynllun Cymhelliant Iaith Athrawon Yfory yng Nghymru ar gyfer cyrsiau sy'n dechrau rhwng 1 Medi 2019 a 31 Awst 2020.
translation.en: 1.1	This section offers a brief overview of the Iaith Athrawon Yfory Incentive Scheme in Wales for courses starting between 1 September 2019 and 31 August 2020.

translation.cy: I fod yn gymwys am grant hyfforddi, rhaid i unigolyn:-
translation.en: To be eligible for a training grant, a person must:-

translation.cy: bod heb gymhwyso fel athro neu athrawes eisoes;
translation.en: not already be a qualified teacher;

translation.cy: I fod yn gymwys i gael y grant hyfforddi o hyd at £5,000, rhaid i unigolyn fod yn dilyn hyfforddiant ar raglen AGA ôl-radd uwchradd a ddechreuodd rhwng 1 Medi 2019 a 31 Awst 2020.
translation.en: To be eligible for the training grant of up to £5,000, a person must be undertaking training on a secondary postgraduate ITE programme which commenced between 1 September 2019 and 31 August 2020.

translation.cy: Yr unigolion eu hunain fydd yn gyfrifol am ofyn i Lywodraeth Cymru am ffurflen manylion gwerthwr.
translation.en: Eligible persons will be responsible for requesting the vendor details form from the Welsh Government.

translation.cy: Yn ôl eu disgresiwn, gallant arfer y pwerau hynny, a byddant yn ystyried pob achos ar sail ei deilyngdod ei hun.
translation.en: They have discretion about whether to exercise those powers and will consider all cases on their merits.

translation.cy: A fydd y grant hyfforddi yn golygu y bydd yn rhaid ichi ddechrau ad-dalu eich benthyciad?

translation.cy: Fel yn achos unrhyw swydd arall, mae'n bosibl y bydd dechrau ennill cyflog fel athro yn golygu y bydd yn rhaid ichi ddechrau ad-dalu eich benthyciad.
translation.en: Loan repayments may be triggered when claimants are earning a salary as a teacher - as in any other job.

translation.cy: Mae'r Cynllun hwn yn gwneud darpariaeth i Weinidogion Cymru dalu grantiau i fyfyrwyr ôl-raddedig uwchradd AGA, sy’n astudio eu rhaglen drwy gyfrwng y Gymraeg neu’r Gymraeg fel pwnc.
translation.en: This Scheme makes provision for the Welsh Ministers to pay grants to secondary postgraduate ITE students, studying their programme through the medium of Welsh or Welsh as a subject.

translation.cy: Ac eithrio lle mae’r cyd-destun yn mynnu fel arall, at ddibenion y Cynllun:-

translation.en: Grants made available under this Scheme are subject to the conditions set out in paragraphs 13 to 15.
